summary:
This mod \"fix\" the Clear Skies shout for who have environmental mods.
When you shout all the three words, revert the weather to the default 81a (clear).
Please note: Climates of Tamriel does not handles the clear weather (81a),
however the shout works fine.
Also this mod allow to use the shout at Winterhold and the Throat of the World
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to

MannyGT\'s Mods

CLEAR SKIES FIX

* OVERVIEW *
This mod \"fix\" the Clear Skies shout for who have environmental mods.
When you shout all the three words, revert the weather to the default 81a (clear).
Please note: Climates of Tamriel does not handles the clear weather (81a),
however the shout works fine.
Also this mod allow to use the shout at Winterhold and the Throat of the World

* INSTALL *
Unpack, activate it by the Menu Launcher and enjoy!

* UNINSTALL *
Just delete the ESP and BSA

* BUGS *
Please report to me any bugs

* FACEBOOK AND TWITTER *
[url=https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods]https://www.facebook.com/MannyGTSkyrimMods[/url]
[url=https://twitter.com/SkyrimMannyGT]https://twitter.com/SkyrimMannyGT[/url]

FOLLOW ME!
author: MannyGT
